Need to blow off steam right before finals? Want to exercise your creative programming skills before CS Night? Join us for the CS Night Game Jam! See the Rules for details.

Announcements

Welcome
Posted 18 Nov 2013 by Sophie Engle

The new CS Night Game Jam website has been launched! The CS Night Game Jam will take place just prior to CS Night on Thursday, December 5, 2013 starting at 4:30pm in LCSI G12. Stay tuned for additional details!
